name: Sandblast
description:
[Weekly Game Jam - Week 189 Submission, Theme: "Small Island"]

It's 1945 and you're living on a small island in the Pacific. Unfortunately, planes overhead drop bombs that get buried on your island. You have from 8 AM until 5 PM to dig up all of the bombs and safely detonate them. If you're not quick enough or careful, you can blow yourself up. 

Secrets

Each level has 3 secret chests you can dig up. Each needs to be opened with a key you find buried, and each contains a unique item - a bomb shield, a bomb detector, and a health increase. It will be a good idea to check as many places as possible.

Controls

Arrow Keys/WASD - Move

J/X - Interact, Dig

K/C - Cancel, Jump
